actions.text: On agreeing to the McAdams amendment (A076) Agreed to by recorded vote: 420 - 3 (Roll no. 398).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McAdams amendment (A076) Agreed to by recorded vote: 420 - 3 (Roll no. 398).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A076) offered by Mr. McAdams.

description: An amendment numbered 221 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to increase and decrease funding by $1 with the intent to instructs the Department of Veterans Affairs submit to the Committees on Appropriations of the House of Representatives and the Senate an implementation plan, including expected timeline and resource requirements, for the Department of Veterans Affairs to complete the requirements of Section 302 of Public Law 115-174.
purpose: Amendment redirects $1 with the intent to instruct the Department of Veterans Affairs to improve veteran credit reporting and to implement important financial protections for veterans.
